description.value: For you, other undead creatures are easy to read, and you have a knack for dealing with them that others lack. You can influence mindless undead and communicate rudimentary orders to your minions. You can use Diplomacy to [[/act make-an-impression]] on mindless undead or make simple requests of them. If the undead creature currently is already in the thrall of a creature whose level is higher than yours, you typically need to roll a critical success (at GM discretion).

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
